messages.content: The Conservatives have taken Rochester & Strood for granted. I've been out and about listening to people and hearing about their hopes and concerns for the future. It's clear that it's time for real change - for the many, not the few

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Teresa is fighting to stop another loss of jobs and skills under a Conservative Government. 800 highly skilled, well-paid jobs are in danger at Chatham Docks. A vote for Teresa will protect jobs and ensure the local economy thrives.

After years of Conservative neglect GP numbers in Rochester and Strood have fallen, waiting lists are rising and more residents report waiting longer at A&E. Teresa will protect the NHS by recruiting more doctors and nurses, and protecting free prescriptions.

The Conservatives have failed on Brexit for three years. The Lib Dems are using it to divide the public. Teresa is committed to a public vote so we can all have a say on whether to leave with a deal or remain. She believes in working together to find a solution.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit: The Conservatives have failed on Brexit for three years. The Lib Dems are using it to divide the public. Teresa is committed to giving people the final say.
issues.environment: Labour's Green New Deal will create thousands of jobs and invest in our environment.
issues.health: Protecting our NHS: After years of Conservative neglect GP numbers in Rochester and Strood have fallen, waiting lists are rising and more residents report waiting longer at A&E. Teresa will protect the NHS by recruiting more doctors and nurses, and protecting free prescriptions.
issues.labourEmployment: Fighting for Local Jobs: Teresa is fighting to stop another loss of jobs and skills under a Conservative Government. 800 highly skilled, well-paid jobs are in danger at Chatham Docks. A vote for Teresa will protect jobs and ensure the local economy thrives.
issues.lawCrime: Reverse Police cuts: We will put bobbies back on the beat and support community safety.
issues.socialWelfare: Care in later life: Labour will introduce free personal care for Over 65s.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to be your Labour candidate in Rochester and Strood. I understand you have had enough of Tory cuts and neglect. For years I have been listening to your concerns and will use my experience as a local councillor to bring about change.

politicalExperience.achievements: Teresa has spent years as a local councillor fighting for residents of Rochester & Strood, fighting the big issues for a better community.

endorsements.endorsement: 'When we needed someone to stand up and be our voice for pensioners, Teresa supported us.'
